analysis.description:
TokenERC20 (/unique_chucks/29/0xedabc2a993cd24d01fe68a200b98190250969714.sol#25-138) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/29/0xedabc2a993cd24d01fe68a200b98190250969714.sol#85-91)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/29/0xedabc2a993cd24d01fe68a200b98190250969714.sol:
	Contract CIC has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/29/0xedabc2a993cd24d01fe68a200b98190250969714.sol#184-186)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

TokenERC20.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/29/0xedabc2a993cd24d01fe68a200b98190250969714.sol#31)
